Items.Name: Zanto Corp Raid
Items.Effect: Zanto Corp's elite forces sieze the time machine, and capture all players present at the Time Lab

Items.Name: Zanto Terrorist Announcement
Items.Effect:
Taking an action in the same location as you took an action last turn gives you 1Tag

Taking an action in a district after 5 consequetive actions in the same district gives you 1Tag

Items.Name: Red District Lockdown
Items.Effect:
Player's in district take damage
Player's must move out
Player's may not enter the district

Items.Name: Blue District Lockdown
Items.Effect:
Player's in district take damage
Player's must move out
Player's may not enter the district

Items.Name: Yellow District Lockdown
Items.Effect:
Player's in district take damage
Player's must move out
Player's may not enter the district

Items.Name: Green District Lockdown
Items.Effect:
Player's in district take damage
Player's must move out
Player's may not enter the district

Items.Name: Constant Broadcasts
Items.Effect: You gain Tags for staying in a district one action sooner
Items.Flavor: They are armed and dangerious report these terrorist's immidiately to Zanto Corp

Items.Name: Checkpoints
Items.Effect: You gain 1Tag anytime you change districts

Items.Name: Camera Update
Items.Effect: You gain 1Tag anytime you spend at least 3 [^Time] at a location

Items.Name: Public Bounty
Items.Effect: Each time you take an action at a Location you must either Pay 1[^Money], take 1Tag, or spend 1 more [^Time]

Items.Name: Scorched Earth
Items.Effect: In the District with the most combined Tags all players take 4Damage

Items.Name: Bounty Hunter
Items.Effect:
Most tagged players pays 5[^Money] or takes 5Damage

Second Most tagged players pay 3[^Money] or take 3Damage

Items.Name: Hunter Drones
Items.Effect: All players take damage equal to the number of tags they have

Items.Name: Corporate Gunship
Items.Effect: The player with the most Tags takes 2Damage and takes 2Damage each action they spend in this district until they leave the district

Items.Name: Time Machine Activates
Items.Effect: The time machine's timer runs out and time is rewound to right before Zanto Corp raided the Time Lab
